radiographic_examinations.findings: The liver shows no evidence of focal lesions or textural abnormality. There is no evidence of intrahepatic or extrahepatic biliary dilatation. The CBD measures 3 mm. The gallbladder is normal without evidence of stones or gallbladder wall thickening. The spleen measures 12.6 cm and has a homogeneous echotexture. Limited views of bilateral kidneys and pancreas are unremarkable.
